verses.verse: Forasmuch As <S%G1895><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Took In Hand <S%G2021><s%> To Draw Up <S%G392><s%> A Narration <S%G1335><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Which Have Been Fully Believed <S%G4135><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Matters, <S%G4229><s%>

As <S%G2531><s%> They Delivered Them <S%G3860><s%> To Us, <S%G2254><s%> They <S%G3588><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> Eye Witnesses <S%G845><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Attendants <S%G5257><s%> Having Been <S%G1096><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%>

It Seemed Good <S%G1380><s%> Also To Me, <S%G2504><s%> Having Been Acquainted <S%G3877><s%> From The First <S%G509><s%> With All Things <S%G3956><s%> Accurately, <S%G199><s%> With Method <S%G2517><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> To Write, <S%G1125><s%> Most Excellent <S%G2903><s%> Theophilus, <S%G2321><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Thou Mightest Know <S%G1921><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Wast Instructed Of The <S%G2727><s%> Things <S%G3056><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Certainty. <S%G803><s%>

There Was <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Of Herod <S%G2264><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Judea <S%G2449><s%> A Priest <S%G2409><s%> Certain, <S%G5100><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Zacharias, <S%G2197><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Course <S%G2183><s%> Of Abijah, <S%G7><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> His Wife <S%G846><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Daughters <S%G2364><s%> Of Aaron, <S%G2><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> Her Name <S%G846><s%> Elizabeth. <S%G1665><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> And They Were <S%G1161><s%> Just <S%G1342><s%> Both <S%G297><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Walking <S%G4198><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Commandments <S%G1785><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ordinances <S%G1345><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Blameless. <S%G273><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Was Not <S%G2258><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> A Child, <S%G5043><s%> Inasmuch As <S%G2530><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Elizabeth <S%G1665><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Barren, <S%G4723><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Both <S%G297><s%> Advanced <S%G4260><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> Their Days <S%G846><s%> Were. <S%G2258><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2407><s%> Fulfilling His Priestly Service <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Order <S%G5010><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2183><s%> Of His Course <S%G846><s%> Before <S%G1725><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

According <S%G2596><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Custom <S%G1485><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Priestly Service, <S%G2405><s%> It Fell To Him By Lot <S%G2975><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Burn Incense, <S%G2370><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Praying <S%G4336><s%> Without <S%G1854><s%> At The <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Incense. <S%G2368><s%>

<S%G3700><s%> And Appeared <S%G1161><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> At The <S%G1537><s%> Right <S%G1188><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Altar <S%G2379><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Incense. <S%G2368><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Was Troubled <S%G5015><s%> Zacharias <S%G2197><s%> Seeing Him, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Fell <S%G1968><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> But Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> Angel, <S%G3361><s%> Fear Not, <S%G5399><s%> Zacharias, <S%G2197><s%> Because <S%G1360><s%> Has Been Heard <S%G1522><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1162><s%> Thy Supplication, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> Thy Wife <S%G4675><s%> Elizabeth <S%G1665><s%> Shall Bear <S%G1080><s%> A Son <S%G5207><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Shalt Call <S%G2564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> His Name <S%G846><s%> John. <S%G2491><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Exultation, <S%G20><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1083><s%> His Birth <S%G846><s%> Shall Rejoice. <S%G5463><s%>

<S%G2071><s%> For He Shall Be <S%G1063><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Strong Drink <S%G4608><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall He Drink, <S%G4095><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> He Shall Be Filled <S%G4130><s%> Even <S%G2089><s%> From The <S%G1537><s%> Womb <S%G2836><s%> Mother <S%G3384><s%> Of His. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Israel <S%G2474><s%> Shall He Turn <S%G1994><s%> To The <S%G1909><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Their God. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Shall Go Forth <S%G4281><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of Elijah, <S%G2243><s%> To Turn <S%G1994><s%> Hearts <S%G2588><s%> Of Fathers <S%G3962><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Disobedient <S%G545><s%> To The <S%G1722><s%> Wisdom <S%G5428><s%> Of The Righteous, <S%G1342><s%> To Make Ready For The <S%G2090><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> A People <S%G2992><s%> Prepared. <S%G2680><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> Zacharias <S%G2197><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel, <S%G32><s%> By <S%G2596><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Shall I Know <S%G1097><s%> This? <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1473><s%> For I 1063 CONJ Am 1510 V-PXI-1S An Old Man, 4246 N-NSM And 2532 CONJ 3588 T-NSF 1135 N-NSF My Wife 3450 P-1GS Advanced 4260 V-RAP-NSF In 1722 PREP 3588 T-DPF 2250 N-DPF Her Days. 846 P-GSF

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S Gabriel, 1043 N-PRI Who 3588 T-NSM Stand 3936 V-RAP-NSM Before 1799 ADV 3588 T-GSM God, 2316 N-GSM And 2532 CONJ I Was Sent 649 V-2API-1S To Speak 2980 V-AAN To 4314 PREP Thee, 4571 P-2AS And 2532 CONJ To Announce Glad Tidings 2097 V-AMN To Thee 4671 P-2DS These; 5023 D-APN

And <S%G2532><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Thou Shalt Be <S%G2071><s%> Silent <S%G4623><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Able <S%G1410><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G891><s%> Till <S%G3739><s%> The Day In Which <S%G2250><s%> Shall Take Place <S%G1096><s%> These Things, <S%G5023><s%> <S%G473><s%> Because <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Didst Not Believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> My Words, <S%G3450><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Shall Be Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2540><s%> Their Season. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Expecting <S%G4328><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Zacharias, <S%G2197><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Wondered <S%G2296><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5549><s%> His Delaying <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple. <S%G3485><s%>

<S%G1831><s%> But Having Come Out <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Was Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Recognized <S%G1921><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> A Vision <S%G3701><s%> He Has Seen <S%G3708><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple. <S%G3485><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Making Signs <S%G1269><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Continued <S%G1265><s%> Dumb. <S%G2974><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass, <S%G1096><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> Were Fulfilled <S%G4130><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Service <S%G3009><s%> Of His <S%G846><s%> He Departed <S%G565><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> His House. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3326><s%> Now After <S%G1161><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Conceived <S%G4815><s%> Elizabeth <S%G1665><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> His Wife, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hid <S%G4032><s%> Herself <S%G1438><s%> Months <S%G3376><s%> Five, <S%G4002><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G3754><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Has Done <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> In Which <S%G3739><s%> He Looked Upon Me <S%G1896><s%> To Take Away <S%G851><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3681><s%> My Reproach <S%G3450><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Men. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> And In <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Month <S%G3376><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sixth <S%G1623><s%> Was Sent <S%G649><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Gabriel <S%G1043><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> Whose <S%G3739><s%> Name Was <S%G3686><s%> Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%>

To <S%G4314><s%> A Virgin <S%G3933><s%> Betrothed <S%G3423><s%> To A Man <S%G435><s%> Whose <S%G3739><s%> Name Was <S%G3686><s%> Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Of David, <S%G1138><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Virgin Was <S%G3933><s%> Mary. <S%G3137><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Coming <S%G1525><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Hail, Thou <S%G5463><s%> Favoured One! <S%G5487><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord Is <S%G2962><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> Blessed Art <S%G2127><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Amongst <S%G1722><s%> Women. <S%G1135><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But She <S%G1161><s%> Seeing Him <S%G1492><s%> Was Troubled <S%G1298><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> , His Word, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Reasoning <S%G1260><s%> Of What Kind <S%G4217><s%> Might Be <S%G1498><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Salutation <S%G783><s%> This. <S%G3778><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Her, <S%G3361><s%> Fear Not, <S%G5399><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> <S%G2147><s%> For Thou Hast Found <S%G1063><s%> Favour <S%G5485><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Thou Shalt Conceive <S%G4815><s%> In Thy <S%G1722><s%> Womb <S%G1064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bring Forth <S%G5088><s%> A Son, <S%G5207><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Shalt Call <S%G2564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> His Name <S%G846><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

He <S%G3778><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Son Of <S%G5207><s%> The Highest <S%G5310><s%> Shall He Be Called; <S%G2564><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Give <S%G1325><s%> Him The <S%G846><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Of David <S%G1138><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> His Father; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Shall Reign <S%G936><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Of Jacob <S%G2384><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages, <S%G165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> Of His Kingdom <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Shall Not Be <S%G2071><s%> An End. <S%G5056><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> But Said <S%G1161><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel, <S%G32><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Since <S%G1893><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Know Not? <S%G1097><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Her, The <S%G846><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Shall Come <S%G1904><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Power Of The <S%G1411><s%> Highest <S%G5310><s%> Shall Overshadow <S%G1982><s%> Thee; <S%G4671><s%> Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Born <S%G1080><s%> Holy Thing <S%G40><s%> Shall Be Called <S%G2564><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Elizabeth <S%G1665><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4773><s%> Thy Kinswoman <S%G4675><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> She <S%G846><s%> Has Conceived <S%G4815><s%> A Son <S%G5207><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1094><s%> Her Old Age, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> This The <S%G3778><s%> Month <S%G3376><s%> Sixth <S%G1623><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> Who Was <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Barren; <S%G4723><s%>
For <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Shall Be Impossible <S%G101><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Any (lit. Every) <S%G3956><s%> Thing. <S%G4487><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bondmaid Of The <S%G1399><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> Be It <S%G1096><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4487><s%> Thy Word. <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Departed <S%G565><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel. <S%G32><s%>

<S%G450><s%> And Rising Up <S%G1161><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> Those Days <S%G3778><s%> Went <S%G4198><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hill Country <S%G3714><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Haste, <S%G4710><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A City <S%G4172><s%> Of Judah, <S%G2448><s%>
